version_description:
-Videos can now be downloaded for offline viewing (currently available for files played natively by the iDevice, Video Station 1.3/DSM 5.0 required)
-Login with QuickConnect is now available (DSM 5.0 required)
-The current program is displayed along

-Videos with AC3 can now be played through transcoding
-Added a badge to show number of videos being downloaded
-Minor bug fixes

． The login history is shared between Synology mobile apps for more convenience (hostnames and account names)
． Volume control is now available from the remote player view (Chromecast and select DLNA TV)
． Improved background downloading on iOS 7

． Improved error messages for easier troubleshooting when streaming under HTTPS is not possible
． Minor bug fixes

． Ratings are now displayed in the movie info page
． Sorting options are available under the "All" category
． The next episode of a TV show or video of a collection now plays automatically
． Improved the certificate verification process to detect

． 64-bit support for better performances
． Corrected the sorting of seasons within a TV show
． Fixed an issue where selecting filters would cause a crash when connected to an older version of Video Station
． The links to IMDb / @movies are back i

． Fixed an issue where the app would lose connection after playing a video when using HTTPS connection on iOS 8.4 devices
． Fixed an issue where the “resume playback” feature was broken on iOS 8.4
． Minor bug fixes

． Added support of 2-step verification for DSM 6.0 to provide extra security
． Enhanced performance of QuickConnect
． Added supports of subtitle sync in the built-in player and on Chromecast
． Added supports of repeat playback in available player

． Enhanced playback compatibility on DS216play when streaming videos in 4K resolution to Chromecast
． Fixed an issue where DTV live streaming might not work properly
． Fixed an issue where streaming videos to Chromecast in AC3 audio codec might not

． Fixed an issue where MP4 files with multiple audio tracks may not be played properly
． Optimized subtitle font size for videos streamed to TV via HDMI converter
． Minor bug fixes

．Added the following new features:
- Offline transcoding
- Rating edition
- Mobile device can be remembered for exempting 2-step verification
． Added a tab of Offline Transcoding in the "Downloaded Videos" page to monitor

．Redesigned the user's interface to be consistent with the style of Video Station 2.0
．Added a new feature to automatically search for subtitles online and download suitable ones when a user plays a video without subtitles
．Added support for adjusti

．Redesigned the user's interface to be consistent with the style of Video Station 2.0
．Added a new feature to automatically search for subtitles online and download suitable ones when a user plays a video without subtitles
．Added support for adjusti

．Added a feature for users to mark videos as watched/unwatched
．Fixed an issue where irrelevant characters may show in remote players
．Minor bug fixes

．You can now browse videos by program and by channel in TV Recordings
．You can now browse videos alphabetically or by release date in a playlist
．Fixed an issue where the app might quit unexpectedly when switching a network connection
．Minor bug

- Added parental control to restrict user access to certain videos with a 4-digit PIN (Video Station 2.2.0 or above required)
- DS video will now remember the settings of the previous playback, including subtitle source, audio track, and subtitle synci

．Fixed an issue where streaming MP4 or M4V videos might not work properly
．Fixed an issue where video subtitles could not be displayed properly
．Minor bug fixes

．Fixed an issue where a user might fail to seek within a video when it is streamed to Chromecast
．Minor bug fixes
．Added compatibility with iPhone X

．Fixed an issue where streaming videos to Chromecast might fail
．Fixed an issue where playing videos via an HDMI adapter might fail
Fixed the issue where there might be problems downloading MP4 files

．Updated Synology's terms and conditions for EU data privacy compliance
．Fixed an issue where posters might not display properly after logging in again

- Supports user interface in Thai language
- Optimized display on the new iPad Pro and iPhone XR
- Fixed an issue where the navigation bar might pop up while playing videos in full screen on iPad
- Fixed an issue where transcoded videos weren’t a

What's New:
1. Supports Firebase Crashlytics to improve the stability of your Synology apps. To learn more about our privacy statement, please visit out website

Fixed Issues:
1. Fixed an issue where it takes a long time to load videos on
Fixed the issue where there might be problems downloading MP4 files
